title: What is some of the most advanced science and technology we have today? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are doing some stuff that is pretty interesting. Super Collider Stem cell research Mapping the genome Printing human organs Robotic surgery Nanotechnology Cancer treatment breakthroughs Understanding the aging process in humans Curing Hepititas C and that should roll through all the Hepititis diseases in the next few years. Understanding Alzheimer's Disease Treatment for HIV+ people This is mostly medical stuff. This is the most interesting area of breakthroughs to me. There are other areas where we are making breakthroughs. Cell phone size Cell phone flexibility Higher density batteries Faster charge times for batteries Best of luck.
